content.d: You seem to be in a bad mood. What happened?
Kasumi and the others treated me like a kid. I’m a college student in the States and a third-year student here! It’s just rude.
What? Are you going to treat me like a kid, too, Umi?
N-no, I’m not. I know you’re responsible, Mia.

Unlike Hono... I mean, some people forget their homework and let their grades slip when they’re having fun. You don’t, Mia. You have a solid routine, and it’s quite impressive. Not everyone can do that, you know.
W-well, yeah! Not everyone can do it! Ha, I feel kinda silly worrying about this now. Hey Umi, let’s go grab some hamburgers!
That’s not a good idea. If you eat something like that as a snack, you won’t have room for dinner.
Stop treating me like a kid!!!
